column5: A few days ago I was fishing out of Mahkwa and talked to a couple in a 1998-ish red Lund about their original Lund seats. I have a seat to give to them that matches theirs, but couldn't find them before we left camp.Hoping they might be WC readers and recognize this post. They were from Illinois.If that was you, PM me here on WC.Pooch
Bumped.Last call for the fellow at Mahkwa three weeks or so ago.Pooch
Pooch, What if you called the lodge, gave them your contact information, and asked them to forward it to the couple?
